behaviors.title: PathTraversalError returned for any PRD or RFC ID containing /, \, or ..
FileTooLarge enforces 10 MB maximum on all input files
Section filename() returns a stable deterministic filename for each section type
all() returns all 10 section types in canonical order (00 through 09)
RfcFrame sections always contains exactly 10 elements sorted by filename
ccp_index_hash is the first 7 hex chars of the BLAKE3 hash of CCP index content
component_references sorted by id for deterministic output
Atomic writes: all section files use write-then-rename for crash safety
